thread.title: Trump says report he ordered Mueller fired is 'fake news'

title: Trump says report he ordered Mueller fired is 'fake news'
text:
Trump says report he ordered Mueller fired is 'fake news' Friday, January 26, 2018 - 01:13 
U.S. President Donald Trump denied a report on Friday that he had ordered Special Counsel Robert Mueller fired last June, calling it ''fake news.'' Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
U.S. President Donald Trump denied a report on Friday that he had ordered Special Counsel Robert Mueller fired last June, calling it "fake news." Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/26/trump-says-report-he-ordered-mueller-fir?videoId=388833891&videoChannel=13423
